## Source: ossf-package-analysis (154cb8a66c0e819b95767bc72d968b896ff4fe92a096091926b1f546ac05d1d6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'fake-linter-no-schema' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
